snippet.title: TMNT Splintered Fate -  Casey Jones & the Junkyard Jam DLC Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Casey Jones joins the fight in this fast-paced, action-packed DLC! Battle through the Junkyard, face new enemies and bosses, and collect new powerful artifacts. Master Casey's hard-hitting moves and team up with the Turtles in co-op to take on the Punk Frogs!

Available now on Steam, Steam Deck, Epic Store, Nintendo Switch and Apple Arcade!

Steam
🖥️ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2996040/Teenage_Mutant_Ninja_Turtles_Splintered_Fate/

Epic Games Store
🖥️ https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/teenage-mutant-ninja-turtles-splintered-fate-0722ac

Nintendo Switch
🇺🇸 https://nintendo.com/us/store/products/teenage-mutant-ninja-turtles-splintered-fate-switch
🇪🇺 https://www.nintendo.com/en-gb/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/Teenage-Mutant-Ninja-Turtles-Splintered-Fate-2557953.html?s=countries

Super Evil Megacorp is an award winning independent game studio building shared gaming experiences that push creative and technical boundaries. From our initial founding in 2012 to a global organization distributed across 11 countries. We have a shared passion and belief to make games that matter.
